title: OUR MISSIONS
description1: An immersive tech firm typically refers to a company that specializes in the development and implementation of technologies that create immersive experiences for users.
description2: Immersive technologies are those that aim to deeply engage the user by creating a sense of presence in a simulated or augmented environment. Some key immersive technologies include virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), mixed reality (MR), and extended reality (XR)
